item.title: RSPCA Pet Quiz Website
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description:

The idea is to create a website that contains a Pet Quiz where people answerÂ a few questions to find out what kind of pet is the best suitable for them.Â The logic for the website is pretty simple so I kept the design simple and clean too. The website is going to be used on iPads inÂ RSPCAÂ ACT’s booth at this year’s FloridaÂ (URL: http://rspcapetquiz.com).
